item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Dorothy M. Neddermeyer
item.description: "Life is ten percent what you experience and ninety percent how you respond to it." -- Dorothy M. Neddermeyer

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Tom Upton
item.description: "I really should come with a warning label." -- Tom Upton

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Michael jordan
item.description: "I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed." -- Michael jordan

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Michael Jordan
item.description: "Obstacles don’t have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don’t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it." -- Michael Jordan

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Michael Jordan
item.description: "My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength." -- Michael Jordan

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Michael Jordan
item.description: "If you quit ONCE it becomes a habit.Never quit!!!" -- Michael Jordan

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Michael Jordan
item.description: "I've never lost a game I just ran out of time." -- Michael Jordan

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Michael Jordan
item.description: "some people wish it would happen, some pepole want it to happen, others make it happen" -- Michael Jordan

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Miracles are a retelling in small letters of the very same story which is written across the whole world in letters too large for some of us to see." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by George Washington
item.description: "It is better to offer no excuse than a bad one." -- George Washington

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Dorothy Allison
item.description: "Things come apart so easily when they have been held together with lies." -- Dorothy Allison

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "You can fool some of the people all of the time, and all of the people some of the time, but you can not fool all of the people all of the time." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Cheryl Hughes
item.description: "When people cheat in any arena, they diminish themselves-they threaten their own self-esteem and their relationships with others by undermining the trust they have in their ability to succeed and in their ability to be true." -- Cheryl Hughes

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Yevgeny Yevtushenko
item.description: "When truth is replaced by silence,the silence is a lie." -- Yevgeny Yevtushenko

item.title: Dorothy add a quote by Cheryl Hughes
item.description: "The truly scary thing about undiscovered lies is that they have a greater capacity to diminish us than exposed ones. They erode our strength, our self-esteem, our very foundation." -- Cheryl Hughes
